column2: SOP - Daily Container Bookings Update - Overview (azure.com)
Feature 17934 Daily Container Bookings Update Service (azure.com)
This service updates the details of the specific daily container booking that the logged in user has chosen to update.

column9: Description

The expected delivery date of the booking

The account number
Code to indicate the container type
If the entered value is true, then booking priority are set. If the entered value is false, then it is not set
